Module WitchHunt
Package fr.sos.witchhunt.controller

Class ConcreteDisplayMediator

java.lang.Object
fr.sos.witchhunt.controller.ConcreteDisplayMediator
All Implemented Interfaces:
DisplayMediator
public final class ConcreteDisplayMediator extends Object implements DisplayMediator

Central class linking the application's 'model' and 'view' levels in terms of display.

Allows keeping the model independent from the view, for a Model-View-Controller approach.

In charge of notifying all concurrent views of display-related events.

Defines a method per situation requiring update of the display. These methods are specified by the interface.

The model's classes requiring to update the view must be associated with a class implementing InputMediator, through which they can send their requests by calling its public methods.

Knows the central class of each concurrent view (StdView and GUIView). These classes come with a set of public methods corresponding to each situation. Most of this class' methods will update all concurrent views, by calling the methods corresponding to the requested notification on each view-related known classes.

If new views were to be added, they should be managed by this class, the same way it manages the already existing views.

Not in charge of collecting user-input : this is the InputMediator's role.

Instantiated once by Application and shared between all components requiring display.

See Also:
  • fr.sos.witchhunt.view
  • StdView, the central class of the Console view
  • GUIView, the central class of the Graphical User Interface
  • fr.sos.witchhunt.model
  • Players can send many different types of display requests, specified by the PlayerDisplayRequester interface's methods
  • Stranger classes send their display requests through an instance of a class implementing DisplayMediator
  • User-input is gathered from the view by another component, the InputMediator

      Central class of the console view.

    • gui

      private GUIView gui

      Central class of the Graphical User Interface.

      Knows all components of the GUI view, and sends them requests through public methods in order to update them.

      Defines a way to display each sort of notification.

      See Also:
      • fr.sos.witchhunt.view.gui
